basics.name: Sam Safaei
basics.label: Product Management / Software Architect
basics.summary: With over 15 years of experience, I have excelled in product and software project management, engineering, test and leadership across various stages of the software lifecycle. As a Product Owner, Project Manager, and Senior Consultant, I have driven requirement gathering, roadmap prioritization, and strategic cross-functional collaboration to deliver complex software solutions and guide organizations in achieving modular, scalable architectures. My expertise includes client interaction, agile leadership, and backlog management, underpinned by a strong foundation in software development using C++, Python, and DevOps practices. I bring a proven ability to align technical execution with business goals, optimize processes, and deliver impactful, high-quality solutions in dynamic environments while advising clients on strategic software transformations.
